response_parsed.title: Designing Edge Runtimes Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer provides a concise guide on designing edge runtimes using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+. It covers key points, code examples, version notes, and caveats to help developers effectively implement FastAPI in their edge computing projects.
key_points: FastAPI is a modern, fast, web framework for building APIs
Supports async functionality out of the box
Compatible with Python 3.7+, but optimized for 3.12+
version_notes: FastAPI version 0.71.0 or later is recommended for Python 3.12+
New features and improvements are continuously added with each new release
caveats: Though FastAPI supports Python 3.7+, it's optimized for 3.12+ which means certain performance benefits will be realized when using the latest version
FastAPI relies on starlette and pydantic under the hood; ensure these dependencies are also compatible with your chosen version of Python
